page.title: 18FARMING-MANOR LAND
page.content: THE MANOR OFFICE,WHICH ADMINISTERS THE PROPERTY OF THE LORD OF THE MANOR,LORD ST.LEVAN, OWNS 3000 ACRES OF THE SURVEY AREA.APPROXIMATELY 1000 ACRES OF THIS IS FARMLAND THE REST BEING CONIFEROUS WOODS AND HEATHLAND. THE 86 ACRES OF WOODLAND ARE USED COMMERCIALLY FOR LOGS,CHRISTMAS TREES AND FOR BREEDING PHEASANTS. A GAMEKEEPER AND ONE WORKER LOOK AFTER THE WOODLAND AREA. 1000 ACRES OF FARMLAND ARE USED AS FOLLOWS POTATOES-150 ACRES CEREALS-180 ACRES CABBAGE AND BROCOLLI-100 REMAINING GRASSLAND SUPPORTS 350 DAIRY CATTLE AND 140 BEEF CATTLE,PLUS GRASS FOR HAY AND SILAGE.
